class_notes: Class will teach simple functional spoken Tibetan language that requires no writing. It is a 2 credit course with two meetings a week. No prior instruction is requirement. Fall 2021 will be fully online. For further questions contact: trigzin@emory.edu.
course_description: This course will be used as an elective for the Middle Eastern and South Asian Studies major. It will also fulfill requirements of affiliated departments.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2319, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-4:50p, Instructor: T. Rigzin, Status: Closed
